description: A new bronze statue in Slovenia takes the place of the former wooden one, set on fire last year.
title: Melania Trump: New metal statue unveiled in Slovenia
title_page: Melania Trump: New metal statue unveiled in Slovenia - BBC News
maintext: It was carved out of a tree trunk by local chainsaw artisan Ales Zupevc and depicted her in a blue coat like the one she wore to her husband's inauguration, but bore only a loose resemblance to the First Lady.
